p: The analytical samples were prepared by diluting an exactly weighed amount of essential oil (corresponding to 10 Î¼L) with 1 mL of internal standard solution, previously prepared by diluting 0.7 mg of n-nonane to a total volume of 10 mL with cyclohexane. Such a preparation was repeated for each sample. These samples were directly used for the qualitative, quantitative, and enantioselective analyses.
